verses.padam: (Padam) dEvAsurA iti# dEva - asurAḥ|saM~MyattA̍ iti# saM - yattAḥ|Asann|tE|dEvAḥ|vijayamiti# vi - jayam|upayanta ityupa̍ - yantaḥ|agnau|vAmam|vasu̍|sam|nIti̍|adadhata|idam|u|naḥ|Baviṣyati|yadi̍|naḥ|jEṣyanti̍|iti̍|tat|agniḥ|nIti̍|akAmayata|tEna̍|apEti̍|akrAmat|tat|dEvAḥ|vijityEti̍# vi - jitya|avaruru̍thsamAnA̍ ityava̍ - ruruthsamAnAḥ|anviti̍|Ayann|tat|asya|saha̍sA|Eti̍|adithsanta|saḥ|arOdIt|yat|arO̍dIt|tat|rudrasya̍|rudratvamiti̍# rudra - tvam|yat|aśru|aśI̍yata|tat|1̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvAsurAḥ saM~MyattA̍ AsantE dEvA vijayamu̍payantO̍ &gnau vAmaM ~Mvasu saM nyadadhatEdamu̍# nO Baviṣyati yadi# nO jEṣyantIti tadagnirnyakAmayata̍ tEnApA̱*krAmat taddEvA vijityA*varuru̍thsamAnA̍ anvAyan̍ tadasya̍ sahasA&&*dithsanta̍ sO# &rOdIdyadarOdIt̍ tad rudrasya# rudratvaM ~MyadaśvraśIyata̍ tad- [ ] 1

verses.padam: (Padam) rajatam|hiraṇyam|aBavat|tasmA̱t|rajatam|hira̍ṇyam|adakṣiṇyam|aśrujamitya̍śru̍ - jam|hi|yaḥ|barqḥiṣi|dadA̍ti|purA|asya|saM~MvathsarAditi̍# saM - vathsarAt|gRuhE|rudanti|tasmA̱t|barqḥiṣi|na|dEya̱m|saḥ|agniḥ|abravIt|BAgI|asAni|atha̍|vaḥ|idam|iti̍|punarAdhEyamiti̍# punaḥ - AdhEya̱m|tE|kEvalam|iti̍|abruvann|Ruddhnava̍t|Kalu̍|saḥ|iti̍|abravIt|yaḥ|maddEvatya̍miti̍# mat - dEvatya̱m|agnim|AdadhAtA̍ ityA̱ - dadhAtai|iti̍|tam|pUṣA|Eti̍|adhatta|tEna̍|2̍ (50)
verses.samhita: rajataṃ̍ hiraṇyamaBavat̍ tasmA̱d rajataṃ hiraṇya-madakṣiṇya-ma̍śrujaṃ̍ hi yO barqḥiṣi dadAti̍ purA&sya# saM~MvathsarAd gRuhE rudanti̍ tasmA̱d baṛqhiṣi na dEyaṃq sO̱&gnirabravId̍ BAgyasAnyatha̍# va idamiti# punarAdhEyaM̍ tE kEvalamitya̍bruvan̍ nRuddhnavat Kalu sa ityabravIdyO̍ maddEvatya̍-magni-mAdadhA̍tA̍ iti taM pUṣA&&dhatta̍ tEna# - [ ] 2

verses.padam: (Padam) pUṣA|ArddhnOt|tasmA̱t|pauṣṇAḥ|paśavaḥ|ucyantE|tam|tvaṣṭA̱|Eti̍|adhatta|tEna̍|tvaṣṭA̱|ArddhnOt|tasmA̱t|tvAṣṭrAḥ|paśava̍ḥ|ucyantE|tam|manu̍ḥ|Eti̍|adhatta|tEna̍|manu̍ḥ|ArddhnOt|tasmA̱t|mAnavya̍ḥ|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|ucyantE|tam|dhAtA|Eti|adhatta|tEna̍|dhAtA|ArddhnOt|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|vai|dhAtA|tasmA̱t|saM~Mvathsaramiti# saM-vathsaram|prajA iti# pra-jAḥ|paśavaḥ|anu̍|prEti̍|jAyantE|yaḥ|Evam|punarAdhEyasyEti̍# punaḥ - AdhEyasya|Ruddhi̱m|vEda̍|3̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pUṣA&&rddhnOt tasmA̱t pauṣṇAḥ paśava# ucyantE taM tvaṣṭA&&dhatta̍ tEna tvaṣṭA̱&&rddhnOt tasmA̱t tvAṣṭrAḥ paśava# ucyantE taM manurA&dhatta̍ tEna manurArddhnOt̍ tasmA̱nmAnavyaḥ̍ prajA ucyantE̍ taM dhAtA&&*dhatta̍ tEna# dhAtA&&*rddhnO̱th saM~MvathsarO vai dhAtA tasmA̱th saM~MvathsaraM prajAḥ paśavO&nu pra jAyantE̍ ya EvaM punarAdhEyasyarddhiM̍ ~MvEda- [ ] 3

verses.padam: (Padam) RuddhnOti|Eva|yaḥ|asya|Evam|bandhutA̱m|vEda̍|bandhu̍mAniti̍ bandhu# - mAn|Bavati|BAgadhEyamiti# BAga -dhEya̱m|vai|agniḥ|Ahita̍ ityA - hitaḥ|icCamAnaḥ|prajAmiti̍# pra-jAm|paśUn|yajamAnasya|upEti̍|dOdrAva|udvAsyEtyu̍t̍ - vAsya|puna̍ḥ|Eti̍|dadhIta|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|Eva|Enam|samiti̍|ardhayati|athO̍ iti|śAnti̍ḥ|Eva|asya|EṣA|puna̍rvasvOriti̍ punaḥ̍ - vasvOḥ|Eti|dadhIta|Etat|vai|punarAdhEyasyEti̍# punaḥ - AdhEyasya|nakṣa̍tram|yat|puna̍rvasU̍ iti punaḥ̍ - vasU|svAyA̱m|Eva|Enam|dEvatAyAm|AdhAyEtyA̱̍ - dhAya|brahmavarcasIti̍# brahma - varcasI|Bavati|darBaiḥ ( )|Eti|dadhAti|ayA̍tayAmatvAyEtyayA̍tayAma̍ - tvAya|darBaiḥ|Eti|dadhAti|adBya̍ ityat̍ - Byaḥ|Eva|Enam|OṣadhIBya̍ ityOṣadhi-Byaḥ|avaruddhyEtya̍va̍ - ruddhya|Eti̍|dhattE|pa~jca̍kapAla̍ iti pa~jca# - kapAlaḥ|purOḍAśaḥ|Bavati|pa~jca̍|vai|Rutava̍ḥ|RutuBya̍ ityRutu - Byaḥ|Eva|Enam|avaruddhyEtyava̍ - ruddhya|Eti̍|dhattE||4̍ (75) (aśIyata̍ tat- tEna-vEda-̍ darBaiḥ pa~jcaviṃśatiśca)̍ (A1)
verses.samhita: rddhnOtyEva yO̱&syaivaM bandhutAM ~MvEda bandhumAn̍ Bavati BAgadhEyaM ~MvA agnirAhita̍ icCamAnaḥ̍ prajAM paśUn yajamAnasyOpa̍# dOdrAvOdvAsya punarA dadhIta̍ BAgadhEyEnaivainaṃq̍ samarddhayatyathO̍ śAntirEvAsyaiṣA̍ punarvasvOrA̍ dadhItaitadvai̍ punarAdhEya̍sya̍ nakṣatraM̍ ~Myat punarvasU̍ svAyAmEvaina̍M̍ dEvatAyAmAdhAya̍# brahmavarcasI Bavati̍ darBai ( ) rA dadhAtyayA̍tayAmatvAya̍ darBairA dadhAtyadBya̍ EvainamOṣadhIByO̍ &varuddhyA &&*dhattE̍ pa~jcakapAlaḥ̍ purOḍAśO# Bavati pa~jca vA Rutava# RutuBya# EvainamavaruddhyA̍ &&*dhattE||4̍ (aśIyata̍ tat- tEna-vEda-̍ darBaiḥ pa~jcaviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) parEti|vai|Eṣaḥ|yajñam|paśUn|vapati|yaḥ|agnim|udvAsaya̍ta̍ ityut̍ - vAsayatE|pa~jca̍kapAla̍ iti pa~jca# - kapAlaḥ|purOḍAśaḥ|Bavati|pA~gkta̍ḥ|yajñaḥ|pA~gktA̱ḥ|paśava̍ḥ|yajñam|Eva|paśUn|avEti̍|rundhE|vIrahEti̍# vIra - hA|vai|Eṣaḥ|dEvAnA̱m|yaḥ|agnim|udvAsayata̍ ityut̍ - vAsayatE|na|vai|Etasya̍|brAhmaṇAḥ|RutAyava̍ ityRuta-yava̍ḥ|purA|anna̱m|akṣann|pa~gktya̍ḥ|yAjyAnuvAkyA̍# iti# yAjyA - anuvAkyA̱ḥ|Bavanti|pA~gktaḥ|yajñaḥ|pA~gkta̍ḥ|puru̍ṣaḥ|dEvAn|Eva|vIram|niravadAyEti̍# niḥ - avadAya|agnim|puna̍ḥ|Eti̍|5̍ (50)
verses.samhita: parA vA Eṣa yajñaM paśUn vapati̍ yO̱&gnimudvAsaya̍tE̍ pa~jcakapAlaḥ̍ purOḍAśO# Bavati pA~gktO# yajñaḥ pA~gktA̱ḥ paśavO# yajñamEva paśUnava# rundhE vIrahA vA Eṣa dEvAnAM ~MyO̱&gnimudvAsaya̍tE̍ na vA Etasya# brAhmaṇA RutAyava̍ḥ̍ purA&nnamakṣan̍ pa~gktyO# yAjyAnuvAkyA# Bavanti pA~gktO# yajñaḥ pA~gktaḥ puruṣO̍ dEvAnEva vIraM niravadAyAgniM̍ punarA - [ ] 5

verses.padam: (Padam) dhattE|śatAkṣarA̍ iti# śata - akṣarAḥ|Bavanti|śatAyuriti# śata - Ayuḥ|puruṣaḥ|śatEndri̍ya̍ iti# śata - indriyaḥ|Ayuṣi|Eva|indriyE|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|yat|vai|agniḥ|Ahi̍ta̍ ityA - hitaḥ|na|RuddhyatE̱|jyAyaḥ|BAgadhEyamiti̍# BAga - dhEya̱m|nikAmayamAna̍ iti# ni - kAmayamAnaḥ|yat|AgnEyam|sarva̱m|Bava̍ti|sA|Eva|asya|Ruddhi̍ḥ|samiti̍|vai|Etasya̍|gRuhE|vAk|sRujyatE|yaḥ|agnim|udvAsaya̍ta̍ ityut̍ - vAsayatE|saḥ|vAca̱m|saṃsRu̍ṣṭAmiti̍ saM - sRuṣṭAm|yajamAnaḥ|Iśvaraḥ|anviti̍|parA̍BavitOriti̍ parA̱ - BavitOḥ|viBaktaya̍ iti vi - Baktayaḥ|Bavanti|vAcaḥ|vidhRutyA̍ iti vi - dhRutyai|yajamAnasya|apa̍rABAvAyEtyapa̍rA̍ - BAvAya|6 (50)
verses.samhita: dhattE̍ śatAkṣarA̍ Bavanti śatAyuḥ puruṣaḥ̍ śatEndriya̍ AyuṣyEvEndriyE̍ prati# tiṣṭhati yadvA agnirAhitO̍ narddhyatE jyAyO# BAgadhEyaM̍ nikAmayamAnO̍ yadA̱gnEyaṃ sarvaM Bavati̍ saivAsyarddhiḥ saM ~MvA Etasya# gRuhE vAk sRujyatE̍ yO̱&gnimudvAsaya̍tE̍ sa vAcaṃq saṃsRuṣṭAM̍ ~MyajamAna̍ IśvarO&nu parABavitOr̍ viBaktayO̍ Bavanti vAcO vidhRutyai̍ yajamAnasyApa̍rABAvAya̍ - [ ] 6

verses.padam: (Padam) viBaktimiti̍ vi - Baktim|karOti|brahma|Eva|tat|akaḥ|upAṅqśvityu̍pa-aṃqśu|yajati|yathA̱|vAmam|vasu̍|vividAnaḥ|gUha̍ti|tAdRuk|Eva|tat|agnim|pratIti̍|sviṣṭakRutamiti̍# sviṣṭa- kRuta̱m|niriti|Aha|yathA̱|vAmam|vasu̍|vividAnaḥ|prakAśamiti̍# pra - kAśam|jigamiṣati|tAdRuk|Eva|tat|viBa̍ktimiti̍ vi - Baktim|uktvA|prayAjEnEti# pra - yAjEna|vaṣa̍ṭ|karOti|Ayata̍nAdityA̱̍ - yatanAt|Eva|na|Eti|yaja̍mAnaḥ|vai|purOḍAśa̍ḥ|paśava̍ḥ|EtE̍ iti|Ahu̍tI̍ ityA - hutI|yat|aBitaḥ|purOḍAśa̱m|EtE̍ iti|Ahu̍tI̍ ityA - hutI|7 (50)
verses.samhita: viBaktiM̍ karOti brahmaiva tadakarupAṃqśu̍ yajati̍ yathA# vAmaM ~Mvasu# vividAnO gUhati̍ tAdRugEva tadagniM prati# sviṣṭakRutaM nirAha̍ yathA# vAmaM ~Mvasu# vividAnaḥ prakAśaM̍ jigamiṣati̍ tAdRugEva tadviBaktimuktvA̍ prayAjEna̍ vaṣaṭkarOtyAyata̍nAdEva̍ naiti yajamAnO̍ vai purOḍAśa̍ḥ̍ paśava# EtE AhutI̍ yadaBitaḥ̍ purOḍAśamEtE̍ AhutI̍ - [ ] 7

verses.padam: (Padam) juhOti|yaja̍mAnam|Eva|uBayata̍ḥ|paśuBiriti̍# paśu - Biḥ|parIti|gRuhṇAti|kRutaya̍juriti̍# kRuta - yajuḥ|saMBRutasaMBAra̍ iti saMBRuta̍ - saBAMqraḥ|iti|Ahuḥ|na|saBRuMtyA̍ iti# saM - BRutyA̱ḥ|saMBArA iti# saM-BArAḥ|na|yajuḥ|kartavya̱m|iti̍|athA̍ iti|Kalu̍|saBRuMtyA̍ iti# saM - BRutyA̱ḥ|Eva|saBAMqrA iti# saM-BArAḥ|kartavya̱m|yajuḥ|yajñasya̍|samRu̍ddhyA̍ iti saM - Ruddhyai|punarniṣkRuta iti punaḥ̍ - niṣkRutaḥ|rathaḥ|dakṣi̍ṇA|punaruthsyUtamiti̍# punaḥ - uthsyUtam|vAsaḥ|punaruthsRuṣṭa̍ iti# punaḥ - uthsRuṣṭaḥ|anaḍvAn|punarAdhEyasyEti# punaḥ - AdhEyasya|samRu̍ddhyA̍ iti saM - Ruddhyai|sapta|tE|agnE|samidha iti# saM - idhaḥ|sapta|jihvAḥ|iti̍|agnihOtramitya̍gni̍ - hOtram|juhOti|yatrayatrEti̍ yatra-yatra|Eva|asya|nya̍ktamiti̍ ni - aktam|tataḥ|8̍ (50)
verses.samhita: juhOti yajamAnamEvOBayata̍ḥ̍ paśuBiḥ pari# gRuhṇAti kRutayajuḥ̍ saMBRutasaMBAra̍ ityAhurna̍ saMBRutyA̱ḥ saMBArA na yajuḥ̍ kartavyamityathO̍ Kalu# saMBRutyA# Eva saMBArAḥ̍ kartavya̍M̍ ~Myajur̍ yajñasya samRuddhyai̍ punarniṣkRutO rathO dakṣiṇA̍ punaruthsyUtaM ~MvAsaḥ̍ punaruthsRuṣṭO&naḍvAn̍ punarAdhEya̍sya̍ samRuddhyai̍ sapta tE# agnE samidhaḥ̍ sapta jihvA ityagnihOtraM̍ juhOti̍ yatrayatraivAsya̍ nyaktaM̍ tata# - [ ] 8

verses.padam: (Padam) Eva|Enam|avEti|rundhE|vIrahEti̍# vIra - hA|vai|Eṣaḥ|dEvAnA̱m|yaḥ|agnim|udvAsayata̍ ityut̍ - vAsayatE|tasya̍|varu̍ṇaḥ|Eva|RuṇayAdityRu̍ṇa̍ - yAt|AgnivAruṇamityA̱gni - vAruṇam|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|anu|niriti̍|vapEt|yam|ca|Eva|hanti̍|yaḥ|ca|asya|RuṇayAdityRu̍ṇa̍ - yAt|tau|BAgadhEyEnEti# BAga - dhEyEna|prIṇAti|na|Arti̱m|Eti̍|RucCati|yaja̍mAnaḥ||9̍ (36) (A-&parABAvAya-purOḍAśa̍mEtE-Ahu̍tI-tataḥ-ṣaṭtriṃ̍śacca)(A2)̍
verses.samhita: Evainamava# rundhE vIrahA vA Eṣa dEvAnAM ~MyO̱&gnimudvAsaya̍tE̍ tasya varuṇa̍ EvarṇayAdA̱gnivAruṇa-mEkAdaśakapAlamanu̍ nirvapEdyaM̍ caiva hanti yaścA̱syarṇayAttau BAgadhEyE̍na̍ prIṇAti nA&&rtimArcCati̍ yajamAnaḥ||9̍ (A-&parABAvAya-purOḍAśa̍mEtE-Ahu̍tI-tataḥ̍ -ṣaṭatriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) BUmiḥ|BUmnA|dyauḥ|variṇA|antari̍kṣam|mahitvEti̍# mahi-tvA||upastha ityupa - sthE|tE|dEvi|aditE|agnim|annAdamityanna̍ - adam|annAdyAyEtyanna̍ - adyAya|Eti̍|dadhE||Eti̍|ayam|gauḥ|pRuśni̍ḥ|akramIt|asa̍nat|mAtara̱m|puna̍ḥ||pitara̱m|ca|prayanniti̍# pra - yann|suvaḥ||triṃqśat|dhAma̍|vIti̍|rAjati|vAk|pata~ggAya̍|śiśriyE||pratIti̍|asya|vaha|dyuBiriti̍ dyu - Biḥ|asya|prAṇAditi# pra - anAt|apAnatItyapa̍ - anatI|antaḥ|carati|rOcanA||vIti|aKyat|mahiṣaḥ|suva̍ḥ||yat|tvA|10̍ (50)
verses.samhita: BUmir̍ BUmnA dyaur variṇA&ntari̍kṣaM̍ mahitvA|upasthE# tE dEvyaditE &gnimannAdamannAdyAyA̍ &&dadhE||A&yaM̍ gauḥ pRuś~jirakramIdasa̍nan̍ mAtaraM punaḥ|pitara̍M̍ ca prayanth suvaḥ||triṃqśaddhAma̍ vi rAjati̍ vAk pata~ggAya̍# śiśriyE|pratyasya̍ vaha dyuBiḥ||asya̍ prAṇAdapAnatya̍ntaśca̍rati̍ rOcanA|vyaKyan̍ mahiṣaḥ suvaḥ||yattvA̱-[̍ ] 10

verses.padam: (Padam) kruddhaḥ|parOvapEti# parA - upava|manyunA̱|yat|ava̍rtyA||sukalpamiti̍# su - kalpa̱m|agnE|tat|tava|puna̍ḥ|tvA|uditi̍|dIpayAmasi||yat|tE|manyupa̍rOptasyEti̍# manyu-parOptasya|pRuthivIm|anviti|daddhvasE||AdityAḥ|viśvE̱|tat|dEvAḥ|vasa̍vaḥ|ca|samABa̍ranniti̍# saM - ABarann||mana̍ḥ|jyOti̍ḥ|juṣatAm|Ajya̱m|vicCi̍nnamiti̍ vi - Cinnam|yajñam|samiti|imam|dadhAtu||bRuhaspati̍ḥ|tanutAm|imam|naḥ|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|iha|mAdayantAm||sapta|tE|agnE|samidha̍ iti# saM - idhaḥ|sapta|jihvAḥ|sapta|11̍ (50)
verses.samhita: kruddhaḥ parOvapa̍# manyunA yadavartyA|sukalpa̍magnE̍ tattava punastvOddIpayAmasi||yattE̍# manyuparOptasya̍ pRuthivImanu# daddhvasE|AdityA viśvE taddEvA vasavaśca̍ samABarann||manO̍ jyOtir̍ juṣatAmAjyaM ~MvicCinnaM̍ ~Myajñaṃ samimaM dadhAtu|bRuhaspati̍stanutAmimaM̍ nO viśvE# dEvA iha mAdayantAM||sapta̍ tE# agnE samidhaḥ̍ sapta jihvAḥ sapta - [ ] 11

verses.padam: (Padam) Ruṣayaḥ|sapta|dhAma̍|priyAṇi̍||sapta|hOtrA̱ḥ|saptadhEti̍# sapta - dhA|tvA|yajanti|sapta|yOnI̱ḥ|Eti|pRuṇasva|GRutEna̍||puna̍ḥ|UrjA|nIti̍|vartasva|puna̍ḥ|agnE|iṣA|Ayu̍ṣA||puna̍ḥ|naḥ|pAhi|viśvata̍ḥ||saha|rayyA|nIti̍|vartasva|agnE̱|pinva̍sva|dhAra̍yA||viśvaP^^sniyEti̍# viśva - P^^sniyA|viśvataḥ|pari̍||lEka̍ḥ|salE̍ka̍ iti sa - lEkaḥ|sulEka iti# su - lEkaḥ|tE|naḥ|AdityAḥ|Ajya̱m|juṣAṇAḥ|viyantu|kEta̍ḥ|sakE̍ta̍ iti sa - kEtaḥ|sukEta iti# su - kEtaḥ|tE|naḥ̍ ( )|AdityAḥ|Ajya̱m|juṣAṇAḥ|viyantu|vivasvAn|adi̍tiḥ|dEva̍jUtiriti̍ dEva# - jUtiḥ|tE|naḥ|AdityAḥ|Ajya̱m|juṣAṇAḥ|viyantu||12 (63)
verses.samhita: ṛṣayaḥ̍ sapta dhAma# priyAṇi|sapta̍ hOtrA̱ḥ saptadhA tvA# yajanti sapta yOnIrA pRuṇasvA̍ GRutEna||puna̍rUrjA̍ ni vartasva̍ punaragna̍ iṣA&&*yuṣA|puna̍rnaḥ̍ pAhi viśvataḥ||saha̍ rayyA ni vartasvAgnE̍ pinvasva̍ dhArayA|viśvaPsni̍yA̍ viśvataspari||lEkaḥ̍ salEkaḥ̍ sulEkastE na# AdityA AjyaM̍ juṣAṇA viyantu̍ kEtaḥ sakEtaḥ̍ sukEtastE na# ( ) AdityA AjyaM̍ juṣAṇA viyantu̍ vivasvAṃq̍ aditir̍ dEvajUtistE̍ na# AdityA AjyaM̍ juṣAṇA viyantu||12̍

verses.padam: (Padam) BUmiḥ|BUmnA|dyauḥ|variṇA|iti̍|Aha|AśiṣEtyA̱̍ - śiṣA̱|Eva|Enam|Eti|dhattE|sarpAḥ|vai|jIrya̍ntaḥ|amanyanta|saḥ|Etam|kasarṇIra̍ḥ|kAdravEyaḥ|mantra̱m|apaśyat|tata̍ḥ|vai|tE|jIrṇAḥ|tanUḥ|apEti̍|aGnata|sarparAjñiyA̍ iti# sarpa -rAjñiyA̱ḥ|RugBirityRuk̍ - Biḥ|gAṛhapatyamiti̍ gAṛha# - patyam|Eti|dadhAti|punarnavamiti̍# punaḥ- navam|Eva|Enam|ajara̱m|kRutvA|Eti|dhattE|athO̍ iti|pUtam|Eva|pRuthivIm|annAdyamitya̍nna̍ - adya̱m|na|upEti|anamat|sA|Etam|13̍ (50)
verses.samhita: BUmir̍ BUmnA dyaur variṇEtyA̍hA&&śiṣaivainamA̍ dhattE̍ sarpA vai jIryantO̍ &manyanta sa EtaM kasarṇIra̍ḥ̍ kAdravEyO mantramapaśyat̍ tatO vai tE jIrṇAstanUrapA̱Gnata sarparAjñiyA# RugBir gAṛhapatyamA̍ dadhAti̍ punarnavamEvainamajara̍M̍ kRutvA &&*dhattE&thO# pUtamEva pRuthivImannAdyaM̍ nOpAnamathsaitaM̍ - [ ] 13

verses.padam: (Padam) mantra̱m|apaśyat|tataḥ|vai|tAm|annAdyamitya̍nna̍ - adya̱m|upEti|anamat|yat|sarparAjñiyA̍ iti# sarpa -rAjñiyA̱ḥ|RugBirityRuk̍ - Biḥ|gAṛhapatyamiti̍ gAṛha# - patyam|AdadhAtItyA̱ - dadhAti|annAdyasyEtya̍nna̍ - adyasya|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava# - ruddhyai|athO iti|asyAm|Eva|Enam|prati̍ṣṭhitamiti̍ prati# - sthitam|Eti|dhattE|yat|tvA|kruddhaḥ|parOvapEti̍# parA - uvapa|iti̍|Aha|apEti̍|hnutE|Eva|asmai|tat|puna̍ḥ|tvA|uditi̍|dIpayAmasi|iti̍|Aha|samiti̍|indhE|Eva|Enam|yat|tE|manyupa̍rOptasyEti̍# manyu - parOptasya|iti|Aha|dEvatA̍Biḥ|Eva|14̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mantramapaśyat̍ tatO vai tAmannAdya-mupAnamadyath̍ -sarparAjñiyA̍# RugBir gAṛhapatya-̍ mAdadhA̱tyannAdyasyAvaruddhyA̍ athO# asyAmEvainaM pratiṣṭhitamA̍ dhattE̍ yattvA̱ kruddhaḥ parOvapEtyAhApa̍hnuta̍ EvAsmai tat punastvOddIpayAmasItyA̍ha̍ samindha̍ EvainaM ~MyattE# manyuparOptasyEtyA̍ha̍ dEvatABirEvai̍ - [ ] 14

verses.padam: (Padam) Enam|samiti|Barati|vIti̍|vai|Etasya̍|yajñaḥ|CidyatE|yaḥ|agnim|udvAsaya̍ta̍ ityut̍ - vAsayatE|bRuhaspati̍vatyEtiq̍ bRuhaspati# - vatya|RucA|upEti|tiṣṭhatE|brahma̍|vai|dEvAnA̱m|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|brahma̍ṇA|Eva|yajñam|samiti̍|dadhAti|vacCi̍nnamiti̍ vi-Cinnam|yajñam|samiti|imam|dadhAtu|iti̍|Aha|saMta̍tyA̍ iti saM - tatyai|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|iha|mAdayantAm|iti|Aha|santatyEti̍# saM - tatya|Eva|yajñam|dEvEBya̍ḥ|anviti̍|diśati|sapta|tE|agnE|samidha̍ iti# saM - idhaḥ|sapta|jihvAḥ|15̍ (50)
verses.samhita: naṃq saM Barati̍ vi vA Etasya# yajñaśCidyatE̍ yO̱&gnimudvAsaya̍tE̍ bRuhaspativatyarcOpa̍# tiṣṭhatE brahma vai dEvAnAM bRuhaspatir brahmaṇaiva̍ yajñaṃ saM dadhAti̍ vicCinnaM̍ ~Myajñaṃ samimaM dadhAtvityA̍ha̍ santatyai̍ viśvE# dEvA iha mAdayantAmityA̍ha̍ santatyaiva yajñaM dEvEByO&nu# diśati sapta tE# agnE samidhaḥ̍ sapta jihvA - [ ] 15

verses.padam: (Padam) iti|Aha|saptasaptEti̍# sapta - sapta|vai|saptadhEti# sapta - dhA|agnEḥ|priyAḥ|tanuvaḥ|tAḥ|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|puna̍ḥ|UrjA|saha|rayyA|iti̍|aBita̍ḥ|purOḍAśa̱m|Ahu̍tI̍ ityA - hutI|juhOti|yajamAnam|Eva|UrjA|ca|rayyA|ca|uBayata̍ḥ|parIti̍|gRuhṇAti|AdityAḥ|vai|asmAt|lOkAt|amum|lOkam|Ayann|tE|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|vIti̍|atRuṣyann|tE|imam|lOkam|puna̍ḥ|aByavEtyEtya̍Bi̍ - avEtya|agnim|AdhAyEtyA̱̍ - dhAya|EtAn̍ ()|hOmAn|ajuhavuḥ|tE|Arddhnuvann|tE|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Ayann|yaḥ|parAcIna̱m|punarAdhEyAditi# punaḥ - AdhEyA̱t|agnim|AdadhItEtyA̱- dadhIta|saḥ|EtAn|hOmAn̍|juhuyAt|yAm|Eva|AdityAḥ|Ruddhi̱m|Arddhnu̍vann|tAm|Eva|RuddhnOti||16̍ (75) (saitaM-dEvatABirEva-jihvA-EtAn-pa~jca̍viṃśatiśca̍ )(A4)
verses.samhita: ityAha̍ saptasapta̍ vai saptadhA&gnEḥ̍ priyAstanuvastA EvAva# rundhE punarUrjA̍ saha rayyEtyaBitaḥ̍ purOḍAśamAhutI̍ juhOti yajamAnamEvOrjA̍ ca# rayyA cOBayataḥ̍ pari# gRuhṇAtyAdityA vA asmAllOkAdamuM ~MlOkamAyaqn̍ tE&muṣmi̍n̍ ~MlOkE vyatRuṣyan̍ ta imaM ~MlOkaM punaraByavEtyA̍ &gnimAdhAyai-tAn. ( ) hOmAnajuhavusta̍ A̱rddhnuvaqn tE suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamAyanq.̍ yaḥ parAcIna̍M̍ punarAdhEyAdagnimAdadhI̍ta̍ sa EtAn. hOmA̱n juhuyAdyAmEvA&&*dityA RuddhimArddhnuvan̍ tAmEvarddhnOti||16̍

verses.padam: (Padam) upaprayanta ityupa̍ - prayantaḥ|addhvaram|mantra̱m|vOcEma|agnayE̱||ArE|asmE̍ iti|ca|śRuṇvatE||asya|pratnAm|anviti̍|dyuta̱m|śukram|duduhrE|ahra̍yaḥ||paya̍ḥ|sahasrasAmiti̍# sahasra - sAm|Ruṣi̱m||agniḥ|mUrdhA|divaḥ|kakut|patiḥ|pRuthivyAḥ|ayam||apAm|rEtAṃ̍si|jinvati||ayam|iha|prathamaḥ|dhAyi|dhAtRuBiriti̍# dhAtRu - Biḥ|hOtA̱|yajiṣṭhaḥ|addhvarEṣu̍|Iḍya̍ḥ||yam|apna̍vAnaḥ|BRuga̍vaḥ|virurucuriti̍# vi - rurucuḥ|vanEṣu|citram|viBuvamiti̍# vi - Buva̱m|viśEviśa̍ iti# viśE - viśE||uBA|vAm|indrAgnI itI̱ndra - agnI|Ahuvaddhyai̱|17 (50)
verses.samhita: upaprayantO# addhvaraM mantraM̍ ~MvOcEmAgnayE̱|ArE asmE ca# śRuṇvatE||asya pratnAmanu dyutaṃ# śukraM duduhrE̍ ahrayaḥ|paya̍ḥ̍ sahasrasAmRuṣi̱M||agnir mUrddhA divaḥ kakutpatiḥ̍ pRuthivyA ayaM|apAṃ rEtAṃsi̍ jinvati||ayamiha prathamO̍ dhAyi̍ dhAtRuBirq. hOtA yajiṣṭhO̍ adhvarEṣvIḍyaḥ||yamapna̍vAnO̍ BRugavO̍ virurucurvanEṣu̍ citraM ~MviBuvaM̍ ~MviśEviśE||uBA̍ vAmindrAgnI̍ AhuvaddhyA# - [ ] 17

verses.padam: (Padam) uBA|rAdhasaḥ|saha|mAdayaddhyai̱||uBA|dAtArau̱|iṣAm|rayIṇAm|uBA|vAja̍sya|sAtayE̱|huvE|vAm||ayam|tE|yOni̍ḥ|Rutviya̍ḥ|yata̍ḥ|jAtaḥ|arO̍cathAḥ||tam|jAnann|agnE|Eti̍|rOha|atha̍|naḥ|varddhaya|rayim||agnE̱|AyUṃ̍ṣi|pavasE|Eti̍|suva|Urja̱m|iṣa̱m|ca|naḥ||ArE|bAdhasva|ducCunA̱m||agnE̱|pava̍sva|svapA̍ iti# su - apA̱ḥ|asmE iti|varca̍ḥ|suvIryamiti̍# su - vIrya̱m||dadhat|pOṣa̱m|rayim|18̍ (50)
verses.samhita: uBA rAdhasaḥ̍ saha mAdayaddhyai̱|uBA̍ dAtArAviṣAṃ̍ rayIṇAmuBA̍ vAjasya̍ sAtayE# huvE vAM||ayaM tE yOniṛ̍ RutviyO yatO# jAtO arOcathAḥ|taM̍ jAnannagna̍ A rOhAthA# nO varddhayA rayiM||agna AyUṃṣi̍ pavasa A suvOrjamiṣaM̍ ca naḥ|ArE bAdhasva̍ ducCunA̱M||agnE pavasva̍ svapA# asmE varcaḥ̍ suvIrya̱M|dadhatpOṣaṃ# rayiM - [ ] 18

verses.padam: (Padam) mayi||agnE̱|pAvaka|rOciṣA̱|mandrayA̱|dEva|jihvayA̱||Eti̍|dEvAn|vakṣi|yakṣi̍|ca||saḥ|naḥ|pAvaka|dIdivaḥ|agnE̱|dEvAn|iha|Eti̍|vaha||upEti̍|yajñam|haviḥ|ca|naḥ||agniḥ|śuci̍vratatama̍ iti śucivrata̍ - tamaḥ|śuciḥ|vipra̍ḥ|śuci̍ḥ|kaviḥ||śuci̍ḥ|rOcatE|Ahu̍ta̍ ityA - hutaḥ||uditi|agnE|śuca̍yaḥ|tava̍|śukrAḥ|BrAja̍ntaḥ|IratE||tava̍|jyOtIṃ̍ṣi|arcaya̍ḥ||AyurdA̍ ityAyuḥ̍ - dAḥ|agnE|asi|Ayuḥ|ma|19̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mayi||agnE̍# pAvaka rOciṣA# mandrayA# dEva jihvayA̱|A dEvAn. vakṣi̍ yakṣi# ca||sa naḥ̍ pAvaka dIdivO&gnE# dEvAṃ ihA &&*vaha|upa̍# yajñaṃ haviśca# naḥ||agniḥ śucivratatamaḥ̍ śucir vipraḥ śuciḥ̍ kaviḥ|śucI# rOcata Ahutaḥ||uda̍gnE̍ śucayastava̍# śukrA BrAjanta̍ IratE|tava jyOtIṅṣyarcaya̍ḥ||AyurdA̍ agnE&syAyu̍rmE̍ - [ ] 19

verses.padam: (Padam) dEhi|varcOdA iti# varcaḥ- dAḥ|agnE|asi|varcaḥ|mE|dEhi|tanUpA̍ iti# tanU - pAḥ|agnE|asi|tanuva̱m|mE|pAhi|agnE̱|yat|mE|tanuvA̱ḥ|Unam|tat|mE|Eti|pRuṇa|citrA̍vasO̍ iti citra# - vasO|svasti|tE|pAram|aśIya|indhAnAḥ|tvA|śatam|himA̱ḥ|dyumanta̍ iti# dyu- mantaḥ|samiti̍|idhImahi|vaya̍svantaḥ|vayaskRutamiti̍# vayaḥ-kRuta̱m|yaśasvantaḥ|yaśaskRutamiti̍# yaśaḥ - kRuta̱m|suvIrAsa̍ iti su - vIrAsaḥ|adA̱Byam||agnE̱|sapatnadaMBa̍namiti̍# sapatna - daMBanam|vaṛṣi̍ṣṭhE|adhIti̍|nAkE̱||samiti̍|tvam|agnE|sUrya̍sya|varca̍sA̍ ( )|agathAḥ|samiti|RuṣI̍ṇAm|stutEna̍|samiti̍|priyEṇa̍|dhAmnA̱||tvam|agnE|sUrya̍varcA̍ iti sUrya# - varcAḥ|asi|samiti|mAm|Ayu̍ṣA|varca̍sA|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|sRuja||20 (67) (Ahuvaddhyai-pOṣaṃ# rayiM-mE-varcasA-sapta̍ daśa̍ ca )(A5)
verses.samhita: dEhi varcOdA agnE&si̍ varcO# mE dEhi tanUpA agnE&si̍ tanuvaM̍ mE pAhyagnE yanmE# tanuvA# UnaM tanma A pRuṇa̍ citrAvasO̍ svasti tE# pAramaśIyEndhA̍nAstvA̍ śataṃ himA̱ dyumantaḥ samidhImahi̍ vayasvantO̍ vayaskRutaM ~MyaśasvantO̍ yaśaskRutaṃ# suvIrAsO̍ adA̱ByaM|agnE# sapatnadaMBanaM̍ ~MvaṛṣiṣṭhE̍ adhi nAkE̱||saM tvamagnE̍ sUryasya̍ varcasA̍ ( ) &gathAḥ samRuṣIṇAṅ̍ stutEna saM priyEṇa dhAmnA̱|tvamagnE̍ sUryavarcA̍ asi saM mAmAyuṣA̍ varcasA̍ prajayA# sRuja||20

verses.padam: (Padam) samiti|paśyAmi|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|aham|iḍaprajasa̍ itIḍa# - prajasaḥ|mAnavIḥ||sarvA̱ḥ|Bavantu|naḥ|gRuhE||aBaMḥ|stha|amBa̍ḥ|vaḥ|BakṣIya|maha̍ḥ|stha|maha̍ḥ|vaḥ|BakṣIya|saha̍ḥ|stha|saha̍ḥ|vaḥ|BakṣIya|Urja̍ḥ|stha|Urja̱m|vaḥ|BakṣIya|rEva̍tIḥ|rama̍ddhvam|asminn|lOkE|asminn|gOṣṭha̍ iti# gO-sthE|asminn|kṣayE̱|asminn|yOnau̱|iha|Eva|sta|itaḥ|mA|apEti|gAta|bahvIḥ|mE|BUyAsta|21̍ (50)
verses.samhita: saM paśyAmi̍ prajA aha-miḍaprajasO̍ mAnavIḥ|sarvA# Bavantu nO gRuhE|aMBaḥ sthAMBO# vO BakṣIya mahaḥ̍ stha mahO# vO BakṣIya sahaḥ̍ stha sahO# vO BakṣIyOrjaḥ sthOrjaM̍ ~MvO BakṣIya rEvatI̍ ramaddhva-masmin̍ ~MlOkE̱&smin gOṣṭhE̱&smin kṣayE&smin yOnAvihaiva̍ stEtO mA&pa# gAta bahvIrmE# BUyAsta - [ ] 21

verses.padam: (Padam) saṃqhitEti# saM - hitA|asi|viśvarUpIriti# viśva - rUpIḥ|Eti|mA|UrjA|viśa|Eti̍|gaupatyEna̍|Eti̍|rAyaḥ|pOṣE̍ṇa|sahasrapOṣamiti̍# sahasra - pOṣam|vaḥ|puṣyAsam|mayi|vaḥ|rAya̍ḥ|śrayantAm||upEti̍|tvA|agnE|divEdi̍va̍ iti# divE-divE|dOṣAvastariti̍ dOṣA̱-vastaḥ|dhiyA|vayam||namaḥ|Bara̍ntaḥ|Eti̍|imasi||rAja̍ntam|addhvarAṇA̱m|gOpAmiti̍# gO - pAm|Rutasya|dIdi̍vim||vardha̍mAnam|svE|damE̱||saḥ|naḥ|pitA|iva|sUnavE̱|agnE̱|sUpAyana̍ iti# su - upAyanaḥ|Bava||sacasva|naḥ|svastayE̱||agnE̱|22̍ (50)
verses.samhita: saṃhitA&si# viśvarUpIrA mOrjA viśA &&*gaupatyEnA̍ &&*rAyaspOṣEṇa̍ sahasrapOṣaM ~Mvaḥ̍ puṣyAsaM mayi# vO rAyaḥ̍ śrayantAM||upa# tvA&gnE divEdivE̍ dOṣAvastarddhiyA̍ vayaM|namO Baranta̍ Emasi||rAja̍ntamaddhvarAṇA̱M̍ gOpAmRutasya dIdiviM|varddha̍mAnaṅq̍ svE damE̱||sa naḥ̍ pitEva# sUnavE&gnE# sUpAyanO Bava|saca̍svA̍ naḥ svastayE̱||agnE- [ ] 22

verses.padam: (Padam) tvam|naḥ|antamaḥ||uta|trAtA|śivaḥ|Bava|varUthya̍ḥ||tam|tvA|śOciṣṭha|dIdivaḥ||sumnAya̍|nUnam|ImahE|saKi̍Bya̍ iti saKi# - Byaḥ||vasuḥ|agniḥ|vasu̍śravA̍ iti vasu# - śravAḥ||acCa|nakṣi|dyumatta̍ma̍ iti# dyumat - tamaḥ|rayim|dAḥ||UrjA|vaḥ|paśyAmi|UrjA|mA|paśyata|rAyaḥ|pOṣEṇa|vaḥ|paśyAmi|rAyaḥ|pOṣE̍ṇa|mA|paśyata|iḍA̱ḥ|stha|madhukRuta̍ iti# madhu - kRutaḥ|syOnAḥ|mA|Eti̍|viśata|irA̱ḥ|mada̍ḥ||sahasrapOṣamiti̍# sahasra - pOṣam|vaḥ|puṣyAsam|23 (50)
verses.samhita: tvaM nO antamaḥ|uta̍ trAtA śivO Bava̍ varUtthyaḥ||taM̍ tvA# śOciṣṭha dIdivaḥ|sumnAya# nUnamImahE̍ saKiByaḥ||vasu̍ragnir̍ vasuśravAḥ|acCA̍# nakṣi dyumattamO̍ rayiM dA̱ḥ||UrjA vaḥ̍ paśyAmyUrjA mA# paśyata rAyaspOṣEṇa̍ vaḥ paśyAmi rAyaspOṣEṇa̍ mA paśyatEḍA̱ḥ stha madhukRutaḥ̍ syOnA mA &&viśatErA̍ madaḥ|sahasrapOṣaM̍ ~Mvaḥ̍ puṣyAsaM - [ ] 23

verses.padam: (Padam) mayi|vaḥ|rAya̍ḥ|śrayantAm||tat|savituḥ|varE̱ṇyam|Barga̍ḥ|dEvasya̍|dhImahi||dhiya̍ḥ|yaḥ|naḥ|pracOdayAditi̍# pra-cOdayA̱t||sOmAna̱m|svaraṇam|kRuṇuhi|brahmaṇaḥ|patE||kakṣIva̍ntamiti̍# kakṣI - vantam|yaḥ|auśijam|kadA|cana|starIḥ|asi|na|indra|saścasi|dAśuṣE̱||upOpEtyupa# - upa|it|nu|maGavanniti# maGa - vann|BUyaḥ|it|nu|tE|dAna̱m|dEvasya̍|pRucyatE||parIti̍|tvA|agnE|pura̱m|vayam|vipra̱m|sahasya|dhImahi||dhRuṣadva̍rṇamiti̍# dhRuṣat - varṇam ( )|divEdiva̍ iti# divE - divE|BEttAra̱m|Ba~ggurAvata̍ iti# Ba~ggura-vataḥ||agnE̱|gRuhapata iti# gRuha - patE|sugRuhapatiriti# su - gRuhapatiḥ|aham|tvayA̱|gRuhapatinEti̍# gRuha - patinA|BUyAsam|sugRuhapatiriti# su - gRuhapatiḥ|mayA̱|tvam|gRuhapatinEti̍# gRuha - patinA|BUyAḥ|śatam|himA̱ḥ|tAm|AśiṣamityA̱ - śiṣa̱m|Eti|śAsE|tanta̍vE|jyOti̍ṣmatIm|tAm|AśiṣamityA̱̍ - śiṣa̱m|Eti|śAsE|amuṣmai̱|jyOti̍ṣmatIm||24̍ (79) (BUyAsta-svastayE&gnE-puṣyAsaM-dhRuṣadva̍rṇa-mEkAnna̍ triṃqśacca# ) (A6)
verses.samhita: mayi# vO rAyaḥ̍ śrayantAM||tathsavitur̍ varE̱ṇyaM BargO# dEvasya# dhImahi|dhiyO yOnaḥ̍ pracOdayA̱t||sOmAnaṅq svaraṇaM̍ kRuṇuhi brahmaṇaspatE|kakṣIva̍ntaM̍ ~Mya auśijaM||kadA̍ cana starIrasi̍ nEndra# saścasi dAśuṣE̱||upOpEnnu maGavan̍ Buya innu tE dAnaM̍ dEvasya# pRucyatE||pari# tvA&gnE puraM̍ ~MvayaM ~Mvipraṃ# sahasya dhImahi||dhRuṣadvarṇaM̍ ( ) divEdivE̍ BEttAraM̍ Ba~ggurAvataḥ||agnE̍# gRuhapatE sugRuhapatirahaM tvayA# gRuhapatinA̍ BUyAsaṃ sugRuhapatirmayA tvaM gRuhapatinA̍ BUyAḥ śataṃ himAstAmAśiṣamA śAsE̍ tantavE̍ jyOtiṣmatIM̍ tAmAśiṣamA śAsE&muṣmai̍ jyOtiṣmatIM||24̍

verses.padam: (Padam) ayajñaḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yaḥ|asAmA|upaprayanta̍ ityupa̍ - prayantaḥ|addhvaram|iti̍|Aha|stOma̱m|Eva|asmai|yunakti|upEti̍|iti̍|Aha|prajEti̍# pra - jA|vai|paśavaḥ|upEti̍|imam|lOkam|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|Eva|paśUn|imam|lOkam|upEti|Eti|asya|pratnAm|anviti̍|dyuta̱m|iti̍|Aha|suvarga̍ iti# suvaḥ - gaḥ|vai|lOkaḥ|pratnaḥ|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|Eva|lOkam|samArOhatIti̍# saM - ArOhati|agniḥ|mUrdhA|divaḥ|kakut|iti̍|Aha|mUrdhAna̱m|25̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ayajñO̍ vA Eṣa yO&sAmOpa̍prayantO̍# addhvaramityAha̍ stOmamEvAsmai̍# yunaktyupEtyAha̍ prajA vai paśava upEmaM ~MlOkaM prajAmEva paśUnimaM ~MlOkamupai̱tyasya pratnAmanu dyutamityAha̍ suvargO vai lOkaḥ pratnaḥ suvargamEva̍ lOkaṃ samArOhatyagnir̍ mUrddhA divaḥ kakudityAha̍ mUrddhAna# - [ ] 25

verses.padam: (Padam) Eva|Enam|samAnAnA̱m|karOti|athO iti|dEvalOkAditi̍# dEva - lOkAt|Eva|manuṣyalOka iti# manuṣya - lOkE|pratIti|tiṣṭhati|ayam|iha|prathamaḥ|dhAyi|dhAtRuBiriti̍# dhAtRu - Biḥ|iti|Aha|muKya̱m|Eva|Enam|karOti|uBA|vAm|indrAgnI̍ itI̱ndra - agnI|Ahuvaddhyai̱|iti|Aha|Oja̍ḥ|bala̱m|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|ayam|tE|yOni̍ḥ|Rutviya̍ḥ|iti̍|Aha|paśava̍ḥ|vai|rayiḥ|paśUn|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|ṣaḍBiriti̍# ṣaṭ - Biḥ|upEti|tiṣṭhatE|ṣaṭ|vai|26̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mEvainaṃ# samAnAnA̱M karOtyathO# dEvalOkAdEva manuṣyalOkE̍ prati# tiṣṭhatyayamiha prathamO̍ dhAyi̍ dhAtRuBirityAha̍ muKyamEvaina̍M̍ karOtyuBA vAmindrAgnI̍ AhuvaddhyA ityAhaujO balamEvAva̍# rundhE &yaM tE yOniṛ̍ Rutviya ityAha̍ paśavO vai rayiḥ paśUnEvAva# rundhE ṣaḍBirupa# tiṣṭhatE ṣaḍvA - [ ] 26

verses.padam: (Padam) Rutavaḥ|Rutuṣu̍|aiva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|ṣaḍBiriti̍# ṣaṭ - Biḥ|uttarABirityut̍ - tarABiḥ|upEti|tiṣṭhatE|dvAda̍śa|samiti̍|padyantE|dvAda̍śa|mAsA̱ḥ|sam~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|sam~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsarE|Eva|pratIti|tiṣṭhati|yathA̱|vai|puru̍ṣaḥ|aśva̍ḥ|gauḥ|jIrya̍ti|Evam|agniḥ|Ahi̍ta̍ ityA - hitaḥ|jIryati|saqm~MvathsarasyEti# saM - vathsarasya|parastA̱t|AgnipAvamAnIBirityA̱gni̍ - pAvamAnIBiḥ|upEti̍|tiṣṭhatE|punarnavamiti̍# punaḥ-navam|Eva|Enam|ajara̱m|karOti|athO iti|punAti̍|Eva|upEti̍|tiṣṭhatE|yOga̍ḥ|Eva|asya|Eṣaḥ|upEti̍|tiṣṭhatE|27̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Rutava# RutuṣvEva prati# tiṣṭhati ṣaḍBiruttarABirupa̍# tiṣṭhatE dvAdaśa̍ saM padyantE̍ dvAdaśa̍ mAsA̱ḥ saM~Mvathsaraḥ saM~Mvathsara̍ Eva prati# tiṣṭhati yathA vai puruṣO&śvO gaur-jIryatyEva-magnirAhi̍tO̍ jIryati saM~Mvathsarasya# parastAdAgnipAvamAnIBi-rupa̍# tiṣṭhatE punarnava-mEvaina-majara̍M̍ karOtyathO# punAtyEvOpa# tiṣṭhatE yOga# EvAsyaiṣa upa# tiṣṭhatE - [ ] 27

verses.padam: (Padam) damaḥ|Eva|asya|Eṣaḥ|upEti̍|tiṣṭhatE|yAc~jai|Eva|asya|EṣA|upEti̍|tiṣṭhatE|yathA̱|pApI̍yAn|śrEya̍sE|AhRutyEtyA̱̍ - hRutya|namasyati̍|tAdRuk|Eva|tat|AyurdA̍ ityAyuḥ̍ - dAḥ|agnE|asi|Ayuḥ|mE|dEhi|iti̍|Aha|AyurdA̍ ityAyuḥ̍ - dAḥ|hi|Eṣaḥ|varcOdA iti# varcaḥ - dAḥ|agnE|asi|varcaḥ|mE|dEhi|iti̍|Aha|varcOdA̍ iti# varcaḥ - dAḥ|hi|Eṣaḥ|tanUpA iti# tanU - pAḥ|agnE|asi|tanuva̱m|mE|pAhi|iti|Aha|28̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dama# EvAsyaiṣa upa# tiṣṭhatE yAc~jaivAsyaiṣOpa# tiṣṭhatE yathA pApIyA~jCrEya̍sa̍ AhRutya# namasyati# tAdRugEva tadAyurdA̍ agnE&syAyu̍rmE̍ dEhItyAhA*&&yurdA̍ hyEṣa̍ varcOdA̍ agnE&si̍ varcO# mE dEhItyAha̍ varcOdA hyEṣa̍ tanUpA̍ agnE&si̍ tanuvaM̍ mE pAhItyAha̍ - [ ] 28

verses.padam: (Padam) tanUpA iti# tanU - pAḥ|hi|Eṣaḥ|agnE̱|yat|mE|tanuvA̱ḥ|Unam|tat|mE|Eti|pRuṇa|iti̍|Aha|yat|mE|prajAyA̍ iti# pra - jAyai̱|paśUnAm|Unam|tat|mE|Eti|pUraya|iti̍|vAva|Etat|Aha|citrA̍vasO̍ iti citra# - vasO|svasti|tE|pAram|aśIya|iti|Aha|rAtri̍ḥ|vai|citrAva̍suriti̍# citra - vasuḥ|avyuṣṭyA̍ ityavi# - uṣṭyai|vai|Etasyai̱|purA|brAhmaṇAḥ|aBaiṣuḥ|vyuṣṭimiti̍ vi - uṣṭim|Eva|avEti|rundhE|indhA̍nAḥ|tvA|śatam|29̍ (50)
verses.samhita: tanUpA hyEṣO&gnE̍ yanmE# tanuvA# UnaM tanma A pRuṇEtyAha̍ yanmE̱ prajAyai# paśUnAmUnaM tanma A pUrayEti̍ vAvaitadAha̍ citrAvasO̍ svasti tE# pAramaśIyEtyA̍ha̍ rAtrir vai citrAvasuravyu̍ṣṭyai̍ vA Etasyai# purA brA̱hmaṇA aBaiṣur̍ vyuṣṭimEvAva̍# rundha indhAnAstvA̍ śataṃ - [ ] 29

verses.padam: (Padam) himA̱ḥ|iti|Aha|śatAyuriti̍# śata - Ayuḥ|puruṣaḥ|śatEndri̍ya̍ iti# śata - indriyaḥ|Ayuṣi|Eva|indriyE|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|EṣA|vai|sUrmI|karṇa̍kAvatIti̍ karṇaka-vatI|EtayA̱|ha|sma|vai|dEvAḥ|asu̍rAṇAm|śatatarqḥAniti̍# śata - tarqḥAn|tRuṃqhanti|yat|EtayA̱|samidhamiti# saM-idha̱m|AdadhAtItyA̱ - dadhAti|vajra̱m|Eva|Etat|śataGnImiti̍# śata - GnIm|yajamAnaḥ|BrAtRu̍vyAya|prEti̍|harati|stRutyai̱|acCa̍baMṭkAramityacCa̍baMṭ̍ - kAram|samiti|tvam|agnE|sUrya̍sya|varca̍sA|agathAḥ|iti̍|Aha|Etat|tvam|asi̍|idam|aham̍ ( )|BUyAsam|iti|vAva|Etat|Aha|tvam|agnE|sUrya̍varcA̍ iti sUrya# - varcAḥ|asi|iti|Aha|AśiṣamityA̱̍ - śiṣa̱m|Eva|EtAm|Eti|śAstE||30̍ (66) (mUrddhAnaṃq-ṣaḍvA-Eṣa upa# tiṣṭhatE-pAhItyAha-śata-mahaṃ̍ ṣOḍaśa̍ ca) (A7)
verses.samhita: himA ityAha̍ śatAyuḥ puruṣaḥ̍ śatEndriya̍ AyuṣyEvEndriyE̍ prati# tiṣṭhatyEṣA vai sUrmI karṇakAvatyEtayA̍# ha sma vai dEvA asurAṇAṃ̍ śatatarqḥAṅ stRuṃhanti̍ yadEtayA# samidhamAdadhA̍ti̍ vajramEvaitacCa̍taGnIM̍ ~MyajamAnO̍ BrAtRuvyAya̍ pra harati̍ stRutyA aCaMbaṭkAraṃq̍ saM tvamagnE̍ sUryasya̍ varcasA&gathA̍ ityAhaitattvamasIdamahaM̍ ( ) BUyAsamiti̍ vAvaitadAha̍ tvamagnE̍ sUryavarcA̍ asItyAhA&&śiṣa̍mEvaitAmA̍ śA̱stE||30

verses.padam: (Padam) samiti|paśyAmi|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|aham|iti|Aha|yAva̍ntaḥ|Eva|grAmyAḥ|paśava̍ḥ|tAn|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|aBaM̍ḥ|stha|aBaM̍ḥ|vaḥ|BakṣIya|iti̍|Aha|aBaM̍ḥ|hi|EtAḥ|maha̍ḥ|stha|maha̍ḥ|vaḥ|BakṣIya|iti̍|Aha|maha̍ḥ|hi|EtAḥ|saha̍ḥ|stha|saha̍ḥ|vaḥ|BakṣIya|iti̍|Aha|saha̍ḥ|hi|EtAḥ|Urja̍ḥ|stha|Urja̱m|vaḥ|BakṣIya|iti̍|31̍ (50)
verses.samhita: saM paśyAmi̍ prajA ahamityAha̍ yAvanta̍ Eva grAmyAḥ paśavastAnEvAva# rundhE&MBaḥ sthAMBO# vO BakṣIyEtyAhAMBO hyEtA̍ mahaḥ̍ stha mahO# vO BakṣIyEtyAha̍ mahO hyEtAḥ̍ sahaḥ̍ stha sahO# vO BakṣIyEtyAha̍ sahO hyEtA̍ Urjaḥ sthOrjaM̍ ~MvO BakṣIyEtyA - [ ] 31

verses.padam: (Padam) Aha|Urjaḥ|hi|EtAḥ|rEva̍tIḥ|rama̍ddhvam|iti̍|Aha|paśava̍ḥ|vai|rEvatI̱ḥ|paśUn|Eva|Atmann|ramayatE|iha|Eva|sta|itaḥ|mA|apEti̍|gAta|iti̍|Aha|dhruvAḥ|Eva|EnAḥ|ana̍pagA̍ ityanapa-gAḥ|kurutE|iṣṭakaciditI̱ṣṭaka-cit|vai|anyaḥ|agniḥ|paśuciditi̍# paśu - cit|anyaḥ|saṃqhitEti# saM - hitA|asi|viśvarUpIriti# viśva - rUpIḥ|iti|vathsam|aBIti̍|mRuśati|upEti̍|Eva|Enam|dhattE|paśucitamiti̍# paśu - cita̱m|Enam|kurutE|prEti|32̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -hOrjO hyEtA̍ rEvatI̍ ramaddhvamityA̍ha̍ paśavO vai rEvatI̱ḥ paśUnEvAtman ramayata̍ ihaiva stEtO mA&pa# gAtEtyAha̍ dhruvA EvainA anapagAḥ̍ kuruta iṣṭakacidvA anyO̱&gniḥ paśucidanyaḥ̍ saṃhitAsi̍# viśvarUpIriti# vathsamaBi mRuśatyupaivaina̍M̍ dhattE paśucitamEnaM̍ kurutE pra - [ ] 32

verses.padam: (Padam) vai|Eṣaḥ|asmAt|lOkAt|cyavatE|yaḥ|AhavanIyamityA̱ - havanIya̱m|upatiṣṭhata̍ ityupa̍ - tiṣṭhatE|gAṛha̍patyamiti̍ gAṛha# - patyam|upEti|tiṣṭhatE|asminn|Eva|lOkE|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|athO̍ iti|gAṛha̍patyAyEti̍ gAṛha# - patyAya|Eva|nIti|hnutE|gAyatrIBi̍ḥ|upEti̍|tiṣṭhatE|tEja̍ḥ|vai|gAyatrI|tEja̍ḥ|Eva|Atmann|dhattE|athO̍ iti|yat|Etam|tRucam|anvAhEtya̍nu̍ - Aha|saMta̍tyA̍ iti saM - tatyai|gAṛhapatyamiti̍ gAṛha# - patyam|vai|anviti|dvipAda̍ iti# dvi - pAdaḥ|vIrAḥ|prEti̍|jAyantE|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|dvipadA̍Biriti̍# dvi - padABiḥ|gAṛha̍patyamiti̍ gAṛha# - patyam|upatiṣṭhata̍ ityupa̍ - tiṣṭhatE|33̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vA EṣO̱&smAllOkAccyavatE̍ ya AhavanIya̍-mupatiṣṭha̍tE̍ gAṛhapatyamupa̍# tiṣṭhatE &sminnEva lOkE prati# tiṣṭhatyathO gAṛhapatyAyaiva̍ ni hnutE̍ gAyatrIBirupa# tiṣṭhatE tEjO vai gAyatrI̍ tEja# EvAtman dhattE&thO yadEtaM tRucamanvAha santatyai̍ gAṛhapatyaM̍ ~MvA anu# dvipAdO# vIrAḥ pra jAyantE̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAn dvipadABir̍ gAṛhapatya-̍ mupatiṣṭhata̍ - [ ] 33

verses.padam: (Padam) Eti|asya|vIraḥ|jAyatE|UrjA|vaḥ|paśyAmi|UrjA|mA|paśyata|iti̍|Aha|AśiṣamityA̱̍ - śiṣa̱m|Eva|EtAm|Eti|śAstE|tat|savituḥ|varE̱ṇyam|iti̍|Aha|prasU̱tyA̍ iti pra - sUtyai|sOmAna̱m|svaraṇam|iti̍|Aha|sOmapIthamiti̍# sOma - pItham|Eva|avEti|rundhE|kRuṇuhi|brahmaṇaḥ|patE|iti̍|Aha|brahmavarcasamiti̍# brahma-varcasam|Eva|avEti|rundhE|kadA|cana|starIḥ|asi|iti̍|Aha|na|starIm|rAtri̱m|vasati|34̍ (50)
verses.samhita: A&sya# vIrO jAyata̍ UrjA vaḥ̍ paśyAmyUrjA mA# paśyatEtyAhA̍ &&śiṣamEvaitAmA̍ śA̱stE tathsavitur̍ varE̱ṇyamityAha̍ prasU̱tyai sOmAnaṅq svaraṇamityA̍ha̍ sOmapIthamEvAva# rundhE kRuṇuhi brahmaṇaspata̍ ityAha̍ brahmavarcasamEvAva# rundhE kadA cana starIrasItyAha̍ na starIṃ rAtriM̍ ~Mvasati - [ ] 34

verses.padam: (Padam) yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|agnim|upatiṣṭhata̍ ityupa̍ - tiṣṭhatE|parIti̍|tvA|agnE|pura̱m|vayam|iti̍|Aha|paridhimiti̍# pari-dhim|Eva|Etam|parIti|dadhAti|aska̍ndAya|agnE̱|gRuhapata̍ iti# gRuha - patE|iti|Aha|yathAyajuriti̍# yathA - yajuḥ|Eva|Etat|śatam|himA̱ḥ|iti|Aha|śatam|tvA|hEmantAn|indhiṣIya|iti̍|vAva|Etat|Aha|putrasya̍|nAma̍|gRuhṇAti|annAdamitya̍nna̍ - adam|Eva|Enam|karOti|tAm|AśiṣamityA̱-śiṣa̱m|Eti|śAsE|tanta̍vE|jyOti̍ṣmatIm̍ ( )|iti|brayAt|yasya̍|putraḥ|ajA̍taḥ|syAt|tEjasvI|Eva|asya|brahmavarcasIti̍# brahma - varcasI|putraḥ|jAyatE|tAm|AśiṣamityA̱ - śiṣa̱m|Eti|śAsE|amuṣmai̱|jyOti̍ṣmatIm|iti̍|brUyAt|yasya̍|putraḥ|jAtaḥ|syAt|tEja̍ḥ|Eva|asminn|brahmavarcasamiti̍# brahma - varcasam|dadhAti||35 (79) (UrjaM̍ ~MvO BakṣIyEti-pra-gAṛhapatyamupatiṣṭha̍tE-vasati-jyOti̍ṣmatI-mEkAnna̍ triṃqśacca)̍ (A8)
verses.samhita: ya EvaM ~MvidvAnagni-mupatiṣṭha̍tE̍ pari# tvA&gnE puraM̍ ~MvayamityAha̍ paridhimEvaitaM pari# dadhAtyaskandAyAgnE̍# gRuhapata ityAha̍ yathAyajurEvaitacCataṃ himA ityAha̍ śataM tvA# hEmantAnindhiṣIyEti̍ vAvaitadAha̍ putrasya nAma# gRuhṇAtyannAdamEvainaM̍ karOti tAmAśiṣamA śAsE̍ tantavE̍ jyOtiṣmatImiti̍# brUyAdyasya# putrO&jAtaḥ̍ syAt tEjasvyE̍vAsya̍# brahmavarcasI putrO jAyatE̍ tAmAśiṣamA śAsE̍ &muṣmai jyOtiṣmatI̍ ( ) miti# brUyAdyasya# putrO jAtaḥ syAt tEja# EvAsmin̍ brahmavarcasaM dadhAti||35̍ (UrjaM̍ ~MvO BakṣIyEti - pra -gAṛhapatyamupatiṣṭha̍tE̍ -vasati-jyOtiṣmatI̍ - mEkAnnatriṃqśacca)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) agnihOtramityagni̍ - hOtram|juhOti|yat|Eva|kim|ca|yajamAnasya|svam|tasya̍|Eva|tat|rEta̍ḥ|si~jcati|prajana̍na̍ iti# pra - jananE|prajana̍namiti̍# pra - jananam|hi|vai|agniḥ|atha̍|Oṣa̍dhIḥ|anta̍gatA̍ ityanta# - gatAḥ|dahati|tAḥ|tataḥ|BUya̍sIḥ|prEti̍|jAyantE|yat|sAyam|juhOti̍|rEta̍ḥ|Eva|tat|si~jcati|prEti̍|Eva|prAtastanEnEti̍# prAtaḥ - tanEna|janayati|tat|rEta̍ḥ|siktam|na|tvaṣṭrA̱|avi̍kRutamityavi̍# - kRutam|prEti|jAyatE|yAvacCa̍ iti# yAvat - śaḥ|vai|rEtasaḥ|siktasya̍|36̍ (50)
verses.samhita: agnihOtraM juhOti̍ yadEva kiM ca yajamAnasya̍ svaM tasyaiva tadrEtaḥ̍ si~jcati prajananE̍ prajananaṃq̍ hi vA agnirathauṣadhIranta̍gatA̍ dahati tAstatO BUyasIḥ̍ pra jAyantE̍ yathsAyaM juhOti rEta# Eva tathsi~jcati̍ praiva prAtastanE̍na̍ janayati tadrEtaḥ̍ siktaM na tvaṣṭrA&vikRutaM̍ prajAyatE̍ yAvacCO vai rEtasaḥ̍ siktasya - [ ] 36

verses.padam: (Padam) tvaṣṭA̱|rUpAṇi|vikarOtIti̍# vi - karOti|tAvacCa̍ iti# tAvat-śaḥ|vai|tat|prEti|jAyatE|Eṣaḥ|vai|daivya̍ḥ|tvaṣṭA̱|yaḥ|yaja̍tE|bahvIBi̍ḥ|upEti̍|tiṣṭhatE|rEta̍saḥ|Eva|siktasya̍|bahuśa̍ iti# bahu - śaḥ|rUpAṇi|vIti̍|karOti|saḥ|prEti̍|Eva|jAyatE|śvaḥ̍ śva iti śvaḥ - śvaḥ|BUyAn|Bavati|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|agnim|upatiṣṭha̍ta̍ ityupa̍ - tiṣṭhatE|aha̍ḥ|dEvAnA̱m|AsI̱t|rAtri̍ḥ|asu̍rAṇAm|tE|asu̍rAḥ|yat|dEvAnA̱m|vittam|vEdya̱m|asI̱t|tEna̍|saha|37̍ (50)
verses.samhita: tvaṣṭA# rUpAṇi# vikarOti# tAvacCO vai tatpra jAyata̍ Eṣa vai daivyastvaṣṭA yO yajatE̍ bahvIBirupa# tiṣṭhatE rEtasa̍ Eva siktasya# bahuśO rUpAṇi vi karOti̍ sa praiva jAyatE̍ śvaḥśvO BUyA̱n Bavati ya EvaM ~MvidvAnagnimupatiṣṭhatE̍ &hardEvAnAmAsId̍ - rAtrirasurAṇAM̍ tE&surA̍ yaddEvAnA̱M ~MvittaM ~MvEdyamAsIttEna# saha- [ ] 37

verses.padam: (Padam) rAtri̱m|prEti|aviśann|tE|dEvAḥ|hInAḥ|amanyanta|tE|apaśyann|AgnEyI|rAtri̍ḥ|AgnEyAḥ|paśava̍ḥ|imam|Eva|agnim|stavAma|saḥ|naḥ|stutaḥ|paśUn|puna̍ḥ|dAsyati|iti̍|tE|agnim|astuvann|saḥ|EByaḥ|stutaḥ|rAtri̍yAḥ|adhIti̍|aha̍ḥ|aBIti̍|paśUn|niriti̍|Arjat|tE|dEvAḥ|paśUn|vittvA|kAmAn̍|akurvata|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|agnim|upatiṣṭha̍ta̍ ityupa̍ - tiṣṭhatE|paśumAniti̍# paśu - mAn|Bavati|38 (50)
verses.samhita: rAtriM prA&*viśantE̍ dEvA hInA amanyanta̍ tE&paśyannAgnEyI̍ rAtrirAgnEyAḥ̍ paśava# imamEvAgniṅ stavAma̍ sa naḥ̍ stutaḥ paśUn punardAsyatIti̍ tE̱&gnimastuvanth̍ sa E̱Byaḥ stutO rAtriyA̍ addhyaharaBi̍ paśUnnirA̱rjattE dEvAḥ paśUn vittvA kAmAṃ# akurvata ya EvaM ~MvidvAnagnimupatiṣṭha̍tE̍ paśumAn Bava̍ - [ ] 38

verses.padam: (Padam) Adityaḥ|vai|asmAt|lOkAt|amum|lOkam|ait|saḥ|amum|lOkam|gatvA|punaḥ|imam|lOkam|aBIti̍|addhyAyat|saḥ|imam|lOkam|AgatyEtyA̱̍ - gatya|mRutyOḥ|abiBEt|mRutyusa̍m~Myuta̍ iti# mRutyu-sam~Myutaḥ|iva|hi|ayam|lOkaḥ|saḥ|amanyata|imam|Eva|agnim|stavAni|saḥ|mA|stutaḥ|suvargamiti# suvaḥ-gam|lOkam|gamayiṣyati|iti|saḥ|agnim|astaut|saḥ|Enam|stutaḥ|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|agamayat|yaḥ|39 (50)
verses.samhita: tyAdityO vA asmAllOkAdamuM ~MlOkamaithsO&muM̍ ~MlOkaM gatvA punarimaM̍ ~MlOkamaByaddhyAyath̍ sa imaM ~MlOkamAgatya# mRutyOrabiBEnmRutyusa̍M~Myuta̍ iva hyayaM̍ ~MlOkaḥ sO&manyatEma-mEvAgniṅ̍ stavAni̍ sa mA̱ stutaḥ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM gamayiṣyatIti̍ sO̱&gnimastauth̍ sa Enaṅ̍ stutaḥ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamagamayadya̍ - [ ] 39

verses.padam: (Padam) Evam|vidvAn|agnim|upatiṣṭhata̍ ityupa̍ - tiṣṭhatE|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|Eva|lOkam|Eti|sarva̱m|Ayuḥ|Eti|aBIti̍|vai|Eṣaḥ|agnI̍ iti|Eti̍|rOhati|yaḥ|Enau|upatiṣṭha̍ta̍ ityupa̍ - tiṣṭhatE|yathA̱|Kalu̍|vai|śrEyAn̍|aByArU̍ḍha̍ ityaBi̍ - ArUḍhaḥ|kAmaya̍tE|tathA̱|karOti|nakta̱m|upEti̍|tiṣṭhatE|na|prAtaḥ|samiti̍|hi|nakta̱m|vratAni̍|sRujyantE̱|saha|śrEyAn̍|ca|pApI̍yAn|ca|AsAtE̍ iti|jyOti̍ḥ|vai|agniḥ|tama̍ḥ|rAtri̍ḥ|yat|40̍ (50)
verses.samhita: EvaM ~MvidvAnagnimupatiṣṭha̍tE̍ suvargamEva lOkamEti̍ sarvamAyurEtyaBi̍ vA EṣO̱&gnI A rOhati̍ ya EnAvupatiṣṭha̍tE̍ yathA Kalu vai śrEyAnaByArU̍ḍhaḥ̍ kAmayatE̍ tathA# karOti naktamupa# tiṣṭhatE na prAtaḥ saṃ hi naktaM̍ ~MvratAni# sRujyantE# saha śrEyAṅśca̍ pApIyAṅścAsAtE̍ jyOtirvA agnistamO rAtrirya - [ ] 40

verses.padam: (Padam) nakta̱m|upatiṣṭhata̍ ityupa̍ - tiṣṭhatE|jyOti̍ṣA|Eva|tama̍ḥ|tarati|upasthEya̍ ityupa̍ - sthEyaḥ|agnI(3)ḥ|na|upasthEyA(3)̍ ityupa-sthEyA(3)ḥ|iti̍|Ahuḥ|manuṣyA̍ya|it|nu|vai|yaḥ|aha̍raharityaha̍ḥ̍ - ahaḥ|AhRutyEtyA̱ - hRutya|atha̍|Enam|yAca̍ti|saḥ|it|nu|vai|tam|upEti̍|RucCati|atha̍|kaḥ|dEvAn|aha̍raharityaha̍ḥ-ahaḥ|yAciṣyati|iti̍|tasmA̱t|na|upasthEya̍ ityupa̍ - sthEyaḥ|athO̍ iti|Kalu̍|Ahuḥ|Aśiṣa̍ ityA̱ - śiṣE̱|vai|kam|yajamAnaḥ|yajatE|iti̍|EṣA|Kalu̍|vai|41̍ (50)
verses.samhita: nnaktamupatiṣṭha̍tE̍ jyOtiṣaiva̍ tamastaratyupasthEyO̍ &gnI(3)r nOpasthEyA(3) ityAhur̍ manuṣyAyEnnvai̍ yO&haraharAhRutyA&thai̍naM̍ ~MyAcati̍ sa innvai tamupA̱rcCatyatha kO dEvAnaharaharyAciṣyatIti̍ tasmAnnOpasthEyO &thO KalvAhurAśiṣE̍ vai kaM ~MyajamAnO̍ yajata ityEṣA Kalu vA - [ ] 41

verses.padam: (Padam) AhitAgnErityAhi̍ta-agnEḥ|AśIrityA̱̍ - śIḥ|yat|agnim|upatiṣṭhata̍ ityupa̍ - tiṣṭhatE|tasmA̱t|upasthEya̍ ityupa̍ - sthEyaḥ|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|paśUn|asRujata|tE|sRuṣṭAḥ|ahOrAtrE ityahaḥ̍ - rAtrE|prEti|aviśann|tAn|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ-Biḥ|anviti̍|avindat|yat|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ-Biḥ|upatiṣṭha̍ta̍ ityupa̍ - tiṣṭhatE|svam|Eva|tat|anviti̍|icCati|na|tatra̍|jAmi|asti|iti̍|Ahuḥ|yaḥ|aha̍raharityaha̍ḥ̍ - ahaḥ|upatiṣṭhata̍ ityupa̍ - tiṣṭhatE|iti̍|yaḥ|vai|agnim|pratya~g~g|upatiṣṭha̍ta̍ ityupa̍ - tiṣṭhatE|pratIti̍|Enam|Oṣati|yaḥ|parA~g̍|viṣva~g~g̍|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|paśuBiriti# paśu - Biḥ ( )|Eti|kavAtirya~g~giti̍ kavA̱ - tirya~g~g|iva|upEti|tiṣṭhEta|na|Enam|pratyOṣatIti̍# prati - Oṣati|na|viṣva~g~g̍|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|paśuBiriti# paśu - Biḥ|Eti||42 (63)
verses.samhita: AhitAgnErAśIr̍ yadagnimupatiṣṭha̍tE̍ tasmAdupasthEya̍ḥ̍ prajApatiḥ̍ paśUnasRujata̍ tE sRuṣṭA ahOrAtrE̍ prA&*viśan̍ tA~jCandOBi-ranva̍#vindad-yacCandO̍Bi-rupatiṣṭha̍tE̍ svamEva tadanvicCati̍ na tatra# jAmyastItyA̍huryO-&ha̍raharupa̍ tiṣṭhata̍ iti yO vA agniM pratya~g~gupa̍ tiṣṭhatE̍ pratyEnamOṣati̍ yaḥ parA~g viṣva~g̍ prajayA# paśuBi# ( ) rEti kavAtirya~g~givOpa̍# tiṣṭhEta nainaM̍ pratyOṣati̍ na viṣva~g̍ prajayA# paśuBirEti||42̍

verses.padam: (Padam) mama|nAma̍|prathamam|jAtavEda̍ iti# jAta - vEdaḥ|pitA|mAtA|ca|dadhatuḥ|yat|agrE̱||tat|tvam|biBRuhi|punaḥ|Eti̍|mat|aitOrityA̍ - EtOḥ|tava|aham|nAma̍|biBarAṇi|agnE||mama̍|nAma̍|tava̍|ca|jAtavEda̍ iti# jAta - vEdaḥ|vAsasI̍ iti|iva|vivasA̍nAviti̍# vi-vasAnau|yE̍ iti|carA̍vaḥ||Ayu̍ṣE|tvam|jIvasE̱|vayam|yathAyathamiti̍# yathA-yatham|vi|parIti|dadhAvahai|puna̍ḥ|tE̍ iti||nama̍ḥ|agnayE̱|apra̍tividdhAyEtyapra̍ti̍ - viddhAya|namaḥ|anA̍dhRuṣṭAyEtyanA̱̍ - dhRuṣṭAya|namaḥ|samrAja̍ iti# saM - rAjE̱||aṣAḍhaḥ|43̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mama nAma# prathamaM jAtavEdaḥ̍ pitA mAtA ca# dadhaturyadagrE̱|tattvaM biBRuhi̍ punarA madaitOstavAhaM nAma# biBarAṇyagnE||mama nAma tava# ca jAtavEdO vAsasI̍ iva vivasAnau̍ yE carAvaḥ|Ayu̍ṣE̍ tvaM jIvasE# vayaM ~MyathAyathaM̍ ~Mvi pari# dadhAvahai punastE||namO&gnayE &pratividdhAya̍ namO&nAdhRuṣṭAya̍ namaḥ̍ samrAjE̱|aṣAḍhO̍ - [ ] 43

verses.padam: (Padam) agniḥ|bRuhadvayA̍ iti# bRuhat - vayAḥ|viśvajiditi# viśva - jit|sahantyaḥ|śrEṣṭha̍ḥ|gandharvaḥ||tvatpi̍tAra̍ iti tvat-pitAraḥ|agnE|dEvAḥ|tvAmAhutaya̍ iti tvAm - Ahutayaḥ|tvadvivAcanA̍ iti tvat - vivAcanAḥ||samiti|mAm|Ayu̍ṣA|samiti̍|gaupatyEna̍|suhi̍ta̍ iti su - hitE|mA|dhAḥ||ayam|agniḥ|śrEṣṭhatama̍ iti śrEṣṭha# - tamaḥ|ayam|Bagavattama̍ iti Bagavat-tamaḥ|ayam|sahasrasAta̍ma̍ iti# sahasra - sAtamaḥ||asmai|astu|suvIryamiti̍# su - vIrya̱m||manaḥ|jyOti̍ḥ|juṣatAm|Ajya̱m|vicCi̍nnamiti̍ vi - Cinnam|yajñam|samiti|imam|dadhAtu||yAḥ|iṣṭAḥ|uṣasa̍ḥ|nimruca̍ iti# ni-mrucaḥ|ca|tAḥ|samiti̍|dadhAmi|haviṣA̱|GRutEna̍||paya̍svatIḥ|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|44̍ (50)
verses.samhita: agnirbRuhadvayA̍ viśvajith sahantyaḥ̍ śrEṣṭhO# gandharvaḥ|tvatpitArO̍ agnE dEvA-stvAmAhutaya-stvadvi̍vAcanAḥ|saM̍ mAmAyuṣA̍ saM gaupatyEna̍ suhitE̍ mA dhAḥ||ayamagniḥ śrEṣṭhatamO̍ &yaM BagavattamO̍ &yaṃ sahasrasAta̍maḥ|asmA̍ astu̍ suvIrya̱M||manO jyOtir̍ juṣatAmAjyaMq ~MvicCinnaM̍ ~Myajñaṃ samimaM dadhAtu|yA̍ iṣṭA uṣasO# nimrucaśca̍ tAḥ saM dadhAmi̍ haviṣA# GRutEna||paya̍svatIrOṣa̍dhayaḥ̍ - [ ] 44

verses.padam: (Padam) payasvat|vIrudhA̱m|paya̍ḥ|apAm|paya̍saḥ|yat|paya̍ḥ||tEna̍|mAm|indra|samiti̍|sRuja||agnE̱|vratapata̍ iti# vrata - patE|vratam|cariṣyAmi|tat|śakEyam|tat|mE|rAddhyatAm||agnim|hOtAram|iha|tam|huvE|dEvAn|yajñiyAn̍|iha|yAn|havA̍mahE||Eti̍|yantu|dEvAḥ|sumanasyamA̍nA̍ iti# su - manasyamAnAḥ|viyantu̍|dEvAḥ|haviṣa̍ḥ|mE|asya||kaḥ|tvA|yunakti|saḥ|tvA|yunaktu|yAni̍|GarmE|kapAlA̍ni|upacinvantItyu̍pa̍ - cinvanti|45̍ (50)
verses.samhita: payasvadvIrudhAM̍ payaḥ|apAM̍ payasO̍ yatpayastEna mAmindra̍ saṃ sRuja||agnE̱̍ vratapatE vrataM cariṣyAmi̍ tacCakEyaM̍ tanmE# rAddhyatAM||agniṃ hOtAramiha̍ taṃ huvE̍ dEvAn. yajñiyAniha̍ yAn. havAmahE||A̍ yantu̍ dEvAḥ sumanasyamA̍nA̍ viyantu# dEvA haviṣO# mE asya||kastvA# yunakti sa tvA# yunaktu yAni# GarmE kapAlA̱nyupacinvanti# - [ ] 45

verses.padam: (Padam) vEdhasaḥ||pUṣṇaḥ|tAni̍|apIti̍|vratE|indravAyU̍ itI̱ndra - vAyU|vIti|mu~jcatAm||aBi̍nnaḥ|Garmaḥ|jIradA̍nuriti̍# jIra - dAnuḥ|yataḥ|Atta̍ḥ|tat|agann|puna̍ḥ||iddhmaḥ|vEdi̍ḥ|paridhaya̍ iti# pari - dhayaḥ|ca|sarvE̱|yajñasya̍|Ayu̍ḥ|anu̍|samiti̍|caranti||traya̍striṃśaditi̍ trayaḥ̍ - triṃqśat|tantavaḥ|yE|vitatnira̍ iti# vi - tatnirE|yE|imam|yajñam|svadhayEti# sva - dhayA̱|dadantE|tEṣA̱m|Cinnam|pratIti̍|Etat|dadhAmi|svAhA̱|Garmaḥ|dEvAn|apIti̍|Etu||46̍ (45) (aṣAḍha-Oṣa̍dhaya-upacinvanti-pa~jca̍catvAriṃśacca)̍ (A10)
verses.samhita: vEdhasaḥ|pUṣṇastAnyapi̍# vrata indravAyU̍ vi mu~jcatAM||aBi̍nnO̍ GarmO jIradAnuryata̍ Attastadagan̍ punaḥ|iddhmO̍ vEdiḥ̍ paridhayaśca̍ sarvE# yajñasyA&&yuranu saM caranti||traya̍striṃśat̍ tantavOq̍ yE vitatnirE̍ ya imaM ~Myajñaṅ svadhayA dadantE̍ tEṣA̱M CinnaM pratyEtad-dadhAmi̍ svAhA# GarmO dEvAṃ apyEtu||46̍ (aṣAḍha-Oṣa̍dhaya-upacinvanti-pa~jca̍catvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) vaiśvAnaraḥ|naḥ|UtyA|A|prEti|yAtu|parAvata̍ iti# parA - vataḥ||agniḥ|ukthEna̍|vAha̍sA||RutAvA̍namityRuta-vAnam|vaiśvAnaram|Rutasya̍|jyOti̍ṣaḥ|pati̱m||aja̍sram|Garmam|ImahE||vaiśvAnarasya̍|daṃqsanA̱Byaḥ|bRuhat|ari̍ṇAt|Eka̍ḥ|svapasya̍yEti̍# su - apasyayA|kaviḥ||uBA|pitarA̱|mahayann̍|ajAyata|agniḥ|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱-pRuthivI|BUrirEtasEti̍ BUri# - rEtasA||pRuṣṭaḥ|divi|pRuṣṭaḥ|agniḥ|pRuthivyAm|pRuṣṭaḥ|viśvA̱ḥ|OṣadhIḥ|Eti̍|vivEśa||vaiśvAnaraḥ|saha̍sA|pRuṣṭaḥ|agniḥ|saḥ|naḥ|divA̱|saḥ|47̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vaiśvAnarO na# UtyA&& pra yAtu̍ parAvataḥ|agnirukthEna̍ vAhasA||RutAvA̍naM̍ ~MvaiśvAnaramRutasya jyOtiṣaspati̱M|aja̍sraM̍ GarmamImahE||vaiśvAnarasya̍# daṃqsanA̱ByO bRuhadariṇAdEka̍ḥ̍ svapasyayA̍ kaviḥ|uBA pitarA# mahayannajAyatAgnir̍ dyAvApRuthivI̍ BUrirEtasA||pRuṣṭO̍ divi pRuṣṭO agniḥ pRuthivyAM̍ pRuṣṭO viśvA OṣadhIrA̍ vivEśa|vaiśvAnaraḥ̍ sahasA̍ pRuṣṭO agniḥ sanO divA sa - [ ] 47

verses.padam: (Padam) riṣaḥ|pAtu|nakta̱m||jAtaḥ|yat|agnE|BuvanA|vyaKya̍ iti# vi - aKyaḥ|paśum|na|gOpA̍ iti# gO - pAḥ|iryaḥ|parijmEti̍ pari# - jmA||vaiśvAnara|brahma̍ṇE|vinda|gAtum|yUyam|pAta|svastiBiriti̍# svasti - Biḥ|sadA̱|naḥ||tvam|agnE|śOciṣA̱|śOśucAnaḥ|Eti̍|rOda̍sI̍ iti|apRuṇAḥ|jAya̍mAnaḥ||tvam|dEvAn|aBiśa̍stErityaBi̍ - śastEḥ|amu~jcaḥ|vaiśvAnara|jAtavEda̍ iti# jAta - vEdaḥ|mahitvEti# mahi - tvA||asmAka̱m|agnE|maGavathsviti# maGavat̍ - su|dhAraya|anAmi|kṣatram|ajara̱m|suvIryamiti̍# su - vIrya̱m||vayam|jayEma|śatina̱m|sahasriṇa̱m|vaiśvAnara|48̍ (50)
verses.samhita: riṣaḥ pAtu̍ nakta̱M||jAtO yadagnE̍ BuvanA̍ vyaKyaḥ̍ paśuM na gOpA iryaḥ parijmA|vaiśvA̍nara̍ brahmaṇE̍ vinda gAtuM ~MyUyaM pAta̍ svastiBiḥ sadA# naḥ||tvamagnE̍ śOciṣA śOśucAna̍ A rOdasI̍ apRuṇA jAyamAnaḥ|tvaM̍ dEvAṃ aBiśastEramu~jcO̍ vaiśvAnara̍ jAtavEdO mahitvA||asmAkamagnE̍ maGavathsu̍ dhArayAnAmi̍ kṣatramajaraṃ# suvIrya̱M|vayaM jayEma̍ śatinaṃ# sahasriṇaM ~MvaiśvAnara̍ - [ ] 48

verses.padam: (Padam) vAja̱m|agnE|tava|UtiBirityUti̍ - Biḥ||vaiśvAnarasya|sumatAviti̍# su - matau|syAma|rAjA̱|hika̱m|BuvanAnAm|aBiśrIritya̍Bi̍ - śrIḥ||itaḥ|jAtaḥ|viśva̱m|idam|vIti|caṣṭE|vaiśvAnaraḥ|yatatE|sUryE̍ṇa||avEti̍|tE|hEḍa̍ḥ|varuṇa|namO̍Biriti̍ namaḥ̍ - Biḥ|avEti|yajñEBi̍ḥ|ImahE|havirBiriti̍# haviḥ - Biḥ||kṣayanna|asmaByamityasma̍ - Byam|asura|pracEta iti# pra - cEtaḥ|rAjann|EnAṃ̍si|śiśrathaḥ|kRutAni̍||uditi̍|uttamamityu̍t̍ - tamam|varuṇa|pAśa̱m|asmat|avEti|adhamam|vIti̍|maddhyamam|śrathAya||atha̍|vayam|Aditya|49̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vAjamagnE̍ tavOtiBiḥ||vaiśvAnarasya̍# sumatau syAma̍ rAjA hikaM BuvanAnA-maBiśrIḥ|itO̍ jAtO viśvamidaM̍ ~Mvi caṣṭE̍ vaiśvAnarO yatatE̍ sUryEṇa||ava̍# tE hEḍO# varuṇa namOBirava̍# yajñEBirImahE̍ havirBiḥ|kṣaya̍nnasmaBya̍masura̍ pracEtO rAjannEnAṃsi̍ śiśrathaḥ kRutAni||udu̍ttamaM̍ ~Mvaruṇa̍ pAśamasmadavA̍&dhamaM̍ ~Mvimaddhyamaṅ̍ śrathAya|athA̍# vayamAditya̍ - [ ] 49

verses.padam: (Padam) vratE|tava|anA̍gasaḥ|adi̍tayE|syAma||dadhikrAv^^ṇṇa̍ iti# dadhi - krAv^^ṇṇaḥ|akAriṣam|jiṣṇOḥ|aśva̍sya|vAjina̍ḥ||suraBi|naḥ|muKA̱|karat|prEti̍|naḥ|AyUṃ̍ṣi|tAriṣat||Eti̍|dadhikrA̍ iti# dadhi - krAḥ|śavasA|pa~jca̍|kRuṣṭIḥ|sUrya̍|iva|jyOti̍ṣA|apaḥ|tatAna||sahasrasA̍ iti# sahasra - sAḥ|śatasA iti# śata - sAḥ|vAjI|arvA̱|pRuṇaktu|maddhvA̱|samiti̍|imA|vacAṃ̍si||agniḥ|mUrdhA|Buva̍ḥ||maru̍taḥ|yat|ha|vaḥ|divaḥ|sumnAyanta̍ iti# sumna - yantaḥ|havA̍mahE||Eti̍|tu|naḥ|50̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Buvaḥ>2̍ BuvO# yajñasya rajasaśca̍ nEtA yatrA# niyudBiḥ sacasE̍ śivABiḥ|divi̍ mUrddhAnaM̍ dadhiṣE suvarṣA jihvAmagnE̍ cakRuṣE havyavAha̱M|(ṭś 4-4-4-4) ==================================== OM namaḥ paramAtmanE, śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaḥ, śrI guruByO namaḥ|hariḥ OM||1.6 prathamakAṇḍE ṣaṣṭhaḥ praśnaḥ -

verses.padam: (Padam) upEti|gantana||yA|vaḥ|śarma̍|śaśamAnAya̍|santi̍|tridhAtUnIti̍# tri - dhAtUni|dAśuṣE̱|yacCata|adhi̍||asmaByamityasma-Byam|tAni̍|marutaḥ|vIti̍|yanta|rayim|naḥ|dhatta|vRuṣaṇaḥ|suvIramiti̍# su-vIra̱m||aditiḥ|naḥ|uruṣyatu|adi̍tiḥ|śarma̍|yacCatu||adi̍tiḥ|pAtu|aṃha̍saḥ||mahIm|u|sviti̍|mAtara̱m|suvratAnAmiti̍# su - vratAnA̱m|Rutasya|patnI̱m|ava̍sE|huvEma||tuvikṣatrAmiti̍# tuvi - kṣatrAm|ajarantIm|urUcIm|suśarmA̍ṇamiti̍# su - śarmAṇam|adi̍tim|supraṇI̍timiti̍# su - praṇItim||sutrAmA̍ṇamiti̍# su - trAmAṇam|pRuthivIm|dyAm|anEhasa̱m|suśarmA̍ṇamiti̍# su - śarmAṇam̍ ( )|aditim|supraṇI̍timiti̍# su - praṇItim||daivI̱m|nAva̱m|svaritrAmiti̍# su - aritrAm|anAgasam|asra̍vantIm|Eti̍|ruhEma|svastayE̱||imAm|sviti̍|nAva̱m|Eti̍|aruham|śatAri̍trAmiti̍# śata - aritrAm|śatasPyAmiti# śata - sPyAm||acCidrAm|pArayiṣṇum||51̍ (69) (divA sa-sahasriṇaM̍ ~MvaiśvAnarA&&-ditya-̍ tU nO-&nEhasaṃ̍# suśarmAṇa-̍ mEkAnna viṃśatiśca̍# )(A11) Prasna KOrvai with starting Padams of 1 to 11 Anuvaakams :- (dEvAsurAḥ-parA-BUmi-rBUmi-rupaprayantaḥ-saM̍ paśyA-myaya̍jñaḥ-̍ saM paśyA-myagnihOtraM-mama̍ nAma-vaiśvAnara-EkA̍daśa)|KOrvai̍ with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries Of Panchaatis :- (dEvAsurAḥ-kruddhaḥ-saM paśyAmi-saM̍ paśyAmi-nakta-mupa̍ganta-naika̍pa~jcAśat)̍ First and Last Padam of Fifth Prasnam :- (dEvAsurAḥ-pArayiṣṇuM)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhE prathamakAṇḍE pa~jcamaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||----------------------------------------
verses.samhita: upa# gantana||yA vaḥ śarma# śaśamAnAya santi# tridhAtUni̍ dAśuṣE# yacCatAdhi|asmaByaM̍ tAni# marutO vi yanta̍ rayiM nO# dhatta vRuṣaṇaḥ suvIra̱M||aditir̍ na uruṣyatvaditiḥ̍ śarma# yacCatu|aditiḥ̍ pAtvaṃhasaḥ||mahImUṣu̍ mAtaraṃ# suvratAnAmRutasya̍ patnImavasE̍ huvEma|tuvikṣatrA-majarantI-murUcIṃ̍ suśarmAṇamadi̍tiṃ̍ supraṇItiM||sutrAmA̍ṇaM̍ pRuthivIM dyAmanEhasaṃ̍# suśarmAṇa̍ ( ) maditiṃ̍ supraṇItiM|daivIM̍ nAvaṅ# svaritrA-manAgasa-masra̍vantImA̍ ruhEmA̍ svastayE̱||imAṃ su nAvamA&ruhaṃ̍ śatAritrAṃ̍ śatasPyA̱M|acCidrAM̍ pArayiṣṇuM||51 (divA sa-sahasriṇaM̍ ~MvaiśvAnarA-ditya-̍ tU nO -̍ &nEhasaṃ# suśarmAṇa-mEkAnnaviṃ̍śatiśca̍# ) (A11) praśna korvai with starting padams of 1 to 11 anuvAkams :- (dEvAsurAḥ-parA-BUmir-BUmi-rupaprayantaḥ-saM̍ paśyA-myaya̍jñaḥ-̍ saM paśyA̍ - myagnihOtraM - mama nAma-vaiśvAnara-EkA̍daśa|)̍ korvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (dEvAsurAḥ-kruddhaḥ-saM paśyAmi-saM̍ paśyAmi-nakta-mupa̍ganta-naika̍pa~jcAśat|)̍ first and last padam of fifth praśnam :- (dEvAsurAḥ-pArayiṣṇuM|)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM prathamakAṇḍE pa~jcamaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||1.5.1 Annexure for 1.5
